name: Goat Quest
description:
Run wildly and avoid all the deadly obstacles while you collect all the coins you can.

This is a beautiful endless game full of fun and challenge, multiple characters and worlds to unlock by collecting coins.

How far can you go?

Main Features:

- Beautiful grapichs
- Unlock cool new Characters
- Unlock new Worlds.
- Compete with your Friends for the High Score
- Fun & Addicting!

Instructions:

1. Tap and hold to the left or right to move
2. Release to back to the center.
3. Avoid the obstacles
4. Collect the coins
